snippet.title: Bunbun Tower — Visual Novel Trailer
snippet.description:
Download for free:
At itch.io: https://namelessdistrict.itch.io/bunbun-tower
At Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/bunbun_tower/449836
At Kartridge: https://www.kartridge.com/games/cLso_nd/bunbun-tower

Description:
Bunbun returns to work at the cafe tower after she completed her therapy. The problem is that she never did return. Instead, Bunbun getting stuck in a loop of horror awaiting her with monsters and her faceless doppelgangers hanging around.

Will she escape from the madness and find her memory fragments to understand what is going on?

------
Twitter here:
https://twitter.com/vnDistrictDev

Blog site:
https://namelessdistrict.wordpress.com/

Download and support the visual novels made by this uploader:
